analyzed: namaḥ mañjuśrī kumāra bhūtāya
atha vajra dharaḥ śrīmān durdānta damakaḥ paraḥ
tri loka vijayī vīraḥ guhya rāj kuliśeśvaraḥ
vibuddha puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ protphulla kamala ānanaḥ

original: bhṛkuṭī - taraṅga - pramukhair anantair vajra - pāṇibhiḥ |
analyzed: bhṛkuṭī taraṅga pramukhaiḥ anantaiḥ vajra pāṇibhiḥ

original: durdānta damakair vīrair vīra - bībhatsa - rūpibhiḥ || 3||
analyzed: durdānta damakaiḥ vīraiḥ vīra bībhatsa rūpibhiḥ
ullālayadbhiḥ sva karaiḥ prasphurat vajra koṭibhiḥ

hṛṣṭa tuṣṭa āśayaiḥ muditaiḥ krodha vigraha rūpibhiḥ
buddha kṛtya karaiḥ nāthaiḥ sārdham praṇata vigrahaiḥ

original: kṛtāñjali - puṭo bhūtvā idam āha sthito'grataḥ || 6 ||

mad hitāya mama arthāya anukampāya me vibho

ajñāna paṅka magnānām kleśa vyākula cetasām
hitāya sarva sattvānām anuttara phala āptaye

original: prakāśayatu sambuddho bhagavān śāstā jagad guruḥ |

original: mañjuśrī jñāna- sattvasya jñāna - mūrtteḥ svayambhuvaḥ || 10 ||
analyzed: mañjuśrī jñāna sattvasya jñāna mūrtteḥ svayambhuvaḥ
gambhīra arthām udāra artham mahārthām asamām śivām
ādi madhya anta kalyāṇīm nāma saṅgītam uttamām

original: pratyutpannāś ca saṃkruddhā yāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ || 12 ||

original: evam adhyeṣya guhyendro vajra - pāṇis tathāgatam |

original: || || || mañjuśrījñānasattvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītiḥ || kṛtāñjali - puṭo bhūtvā pra - kāyaḥ sthito'grataḥ || 16 ||

original: bhūta-vādī yathā-vādī tathā kārī ananya - vāk || 46 ||

analyzed: buddhānām viṣayaḥ hi eṣa samyak sambuddha deśitaḥ
ityupasaṃhāra gāthāḥ pañca

original: ārya - māyā jāla - ṣoḍaśa sāhasrikān mahā-yoga- tantrāntaḥpāti-samādhijāla-paṭalād bhagavato mañjuśrī -jñāna- sattvasya paramārthā nāma-saṅgītir bhagavat-tathāgata- śākyamuni bhāṣitā samāptā ||
analyzed: ārya māyā jāla ṣoḍaśa sāhasrikāt mahā yoga tantra antaḥpāti samādhi jāla paṭalāt bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñāna sattvasya paramārthā nāma saṅgītiḥ bhagavat tathāgata śākyamuni
